name: Patchareeboon Mam Sakulpitakphon
position: Sustainability and Impact Lead - PALO IT Thailand
introduction: Patchareeboon Mam has more than 16 years of experience on international development and sustainability projects, especially relating to business and human rights and corporate sustainability
how_they_help: Share the lessons learned, experiences, and my knowledge with the Matcha Initiative community.
sustainability_journey: With my human rights and international development background, I had incredible opportunities to work on several public-private sector partnerships with great success and impact. Thus, I wanted to continue and leverage the private sectors' ability to create positive impact to society and environment through corporate sustainability.
current_role: I am the Sustainability and Impact Lead for PALO IT Thailand. We are in the process of obtaining a B Corp certification and integrating sustainable IT into our practice. B Corp certification involves a thorough evaluation of how a company's practices impact its workers, community, environment, and customer and it requires detailed reporting on various aspects like carbon footprint, governance, diversity, employee benefits, data handling, and supply chain practices.
training_activities: I'm also facilitating Climate Fresk and training sessions for our staff and client related to sustainability. Previously, I conducted Masterclass trainings for the United Nations and PwC Thailand relating to 'business and human rights' and the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights too.
challenges_overcome: Working in 'sustainability' and/or 'development' can seem overwhelming and there's a never ending list of challenges. I recognize now through the years that the key is on building your own resilience and well-being too. It's important to stay focus, practical, and maintain our optimism in order to continue. Giving up doesn't help anything.
proudest_achievement: There are many 'most proud of' moments but it's really generating positive impact for people, society, and the world through my career in different ways.
